articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The West African country investigates how a space rock found there was put up for sale in New York.
articles.title: Martian meteorite: Niger's anger that a piece of Mars ended up for auction

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Under the proposals, those who are given fixed-term sentences could be deported straight away and would be barred from re-entering the UK.
articles.title: Foreign criminals to face deportation after sentencing under new plans

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Tariffs, oversupply and teetotaling Gen-Zs have all contributed to the downfall of one of America's most iconic liquors.
articles.title: How Kentucky bourbon went from boom to bust

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Meanwhile in Gaza, five people, including two children, died in the past 24 hours from malnutrition, the Hamas-run health ministry said.
articles.title: Protesters in Israel intensify pressure against plan to expand Gaza war

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The new version of War of the Worlds has received a 0% critic score on review site Rotten Tomatoes.
articles.title: Is War of the Worlds really one of the worst films ever?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The White House says Trump is open to Ukraine joining talks with Putin on Friday, as Zelensky insists any deal without Kyiv is a “dead decision”.
articles.title: Alaska summit: Europe allies urge Trump not to deal with Putin without Ukraine

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The wellness drinks industry is booming – but the big benefits they promise might be too good to be true.
articles.title: Do wellness drinks really do what they say?

articles.description: Richard Lynn says a parking firm mistook his car for another with a nearly identical number plate.
articles.title: Man's anger over number plate mix-up parking penalty

articles.description: Ed Sheeran grew up in England but described himself as 'culturally Irish,' prompting debate about what that really means
articles.title: The complex question of what it is to be culturally Irish in 2025

articles.description: The Home Office says 435 migrants in seven boats arrived in Dover on Saturday.
articles.title: More than 400 migrants brought to shore at Dover
